name: Panchalae Boutique Residences

reviews.text: this can only be described as a tenement built on 2 acres of waste ground, the block interiour was was soleless and dirty, the apartment was big enough, but in desperate need of refurbishing, the terrace furnitrure was so broken down as to be dangerious to sit on, and we had to climb on a chair to switch on the AC. a visit to the pool area was beond belief, there was a sign saying under repair and the place looked like an eco desaster zone, with garbage and pool chairs strewn around and the pool half full of swamp water. We stayed two hours and then checked into a hotel up the road even though we paid in advance. Dont go there!
reviews.title: Shockingly bad

reviews.text: These apartments are of good value, and are situated in a prime location a short walk from the beach, shops bars and restaurants.The Salotto Cafe was exceptionally good for food and friendliness.If you want to go into the heart of Pattaya you only have to get the bart bus at the end of the road. Our only negative view would be the pool which was a little murky and didnt fancy using it, however we would not hesitate to return again, as it was quiet and within distance of all amenities.
reviews.title: A very pleasant Residence
perfect
reviews.text: Stayed here with my wife and 15 year old daughter.The apartment we stayed in was perfect owned by gregg. Nothing was to much trouble the staff and security were brilliant position of the property was perfect for the beach and restaurants als it is just a 10 min ride on a baht bus to central pattaya gregg and his wife also have a restaurant next to panchalae where the food is excellent and they do a great mohito all very reasonably priced we have booked again for 3 weeks again in dec/jan in a larger ground floor apartment and really cant wait to return so i really do recommend this property and take no notice of any negative reviews sometimes people just look for negatives but we are yet to find any.

Stayed here with my family for one week. Plusses are that the appartments are very spacious with a huge living room with sofa, DVD,TV, and free WIFI, kitchen with everything you need, two bedrooms, two bathrooms and a big outdoor veranda (although no view, only backyard of the neighbours but since the beach is around the corner not a problem). Style is modern and very simple but fine. Also a very good location, 100 meters walk from the beach and close to restaurants and shops. So at checkin I was happy but after a few days we noticed lack of maintance and service, staff are nice but not interested to make your stay comfortable at all (apart from the guard at the road enterance, he was very sweet, helpfull and welcoming). Which means our appartment was bearly cleaned (could wright my name on the bedside table, appartment was only cleaned few times in a full week only sweeping the floor and a highspeed mop at 5 pm only because we asked!). Some days there wasn't cleaned at all and our carbage (kitchen!) was smelling away for a few days, nowhere to get rid of it (I wouldn't have mind doing it myself but nobody cared to explain where). Cleaning lady was mostly 'chilling out' outside the building when we came back from a day sightseeing not intending to do any work (we did get a nice smile and hello though). One day when she did a quick sweep through the appartment we noticed later she left all balcony doors unlocked....bit uncarefull. The worst was we didn't even had one towel change in one week!!! I knew in advance that they noticed on their website if you stay one week you only get a towel change twice, which is fine if you know in advance but no towel change at all is just very guest unfriendly. After 5 days we decided to buy ourselves some new towels....When we complained at the 'frontdesk' they said to go tell the cleaning lady ourselves.....OK???? Further we noticed little things kept unrepaired everywhere, from lightbulbs that were broken, parts of the door and floor beeing broken and eaten by termites, hughe brown stains in the curtains, pond in the garden green and empty, tiles at the pool broken.... all little things but it gave us the feeling nobody cares, in few years it will probably look terrible if it continues like this. Eveything is dusting away! So overall it was ok, the location and space inside were enjoyable but the 'no service' attitude did cause some irritation which is a pitty, beeing on holiday it would have been nice to come back after you day out in a cleaned place! We know it's not a hotel but cleaning/towel change was inluded and for what we paid (24.000 bath/week) we feel they could have a least have the appartment sweeped and mopped once a day + emptying the bins. Won't recommend and won't return......
reviews.title: OK but starts to get rundown....

reviews.text: The Panchalae apartments at Jomtien beach offers a more boutique style accommodation experience unlike other resorts in the area. Its location is close to all attractions of both Jomtien and Pattaya areas however not overcrowded by tourists. The apartment itself has an excellent layout with a large kitchen/living area and 2 x generious sized double bedrooms both with ensuites. Additional luxuries such as a LCD TV and air-conditioned rooms are included making sure our stay was more than comfortable. The room was serviced each day and kept very clean. The apartment complex was quiet at all times and the office staff and security were friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: First class apartments at Panchalae Jomtien

reviews.text: I know it's been a long time since our stay for this review. But as the quote say " It's better late than never ". england pauline is my mother inlaw I agree totally on what she've said but in addition to it, no lies what you see in the website is what you get in the real thing with additions by your request. The personnels are so nice to us. TWO THUMBS UP!!!
reviews.title: We've Bonded

likes.liked: — it was perfect for the holiday we wanted

reviews.text: stayed in this luxury apartment in october there were 4 adults and 1child in our party it was super 2 large bedrooms,2 bathrooms and loads of living space, very comfortable and clean, good pool (quite warm), quiet area away from traffic,lots of eating places and shops nearby would reccomend this apartment for all age groups.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We come back. Great stay nearby everything. Great rooms, friendly and helpfull staff. The only little minus was that there were some problems with the pool. But management promised to fix everything in th low season.
reviews.title: great quit condo nearby everything
Isn't it always a gamble ? this one paid off.

reviews.text: Me and my husband stayed with our 5 month baby boy at Panchalae for 5 weeks, and all staff where so nice and helpful. Our housekeeper did also babysit our son a couple of times so we could go out for dinner.
reviews.title: Close your eyes & BOOK!

reviews.text: The appartment was very nice, and has all you need. Housekeeping everyday.
reviews.title: Definitely recommendable.

description: Spacious luxury 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom, serviced Apartments right on Jomtien Beachfront! With Satellite TV, WiFi, Daily Service & Weekly Linen, these are truly a home from home. Just walk out the security gates and you're on the beach amidst the restaurants and nightlife of Jomtien.
